title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server that lets you pull, run, and chat with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, Phi, etc. locally via a single binary.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python SDK that wraps Ollama’s REST API—chat, generate, embed, pull, list models with async support.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same generate/chat/embed API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama LLMs, chat models and embeddings with standard LangChain interfaces.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Full-featured, open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama—multi-model chats, code highlighting, RAG, admin panel.

title: ollama-cli-copilot
summary: Lightweight Rust CLI that turns Ollama into a GitHub-Copilot-like coding assistant with inline completions.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal Retrieval-Augmented-Generation template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma to chat with local PDFs.

title: ollama-copilot.vim
summary: Vim plugin that adds AI code completion powered by any Ollama model; supports tab completion and custom prompts.

title: chatbox-ai (Bin-Huang/chatbox)
summary: Cross-platform desktop chat client (Electron) supporting Ollama, OpenAI, Azure, etc. with prompt library and markdown.

title: ollama4j
summary: Community-maintained Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; offers sync/async APIs and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by Ollama team—use local models as Generator or Embedder in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Curated recipes showing how to integrate Ollama with LlamaIndex, Autogen, Hugging Face, Gradio, etc.

title: ollama-napi-rs
summary: Rust crate + Node-API bindings exposing high-performance Ollama calls from Node.js without HTTP overhead.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Simple Python bot bringing local Ollama models into Discord slash commands with conversation memory.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama server on Kubernetes with GPU nodeSelector and PVC model caching.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem wrapping Ollama’s REST endpoints; includes Railtie for seamless Rails integration.

title: ollama-lm-studio-bridge
summary: LM Studio plugin that discovers and proxies Ollama instances so you can use any Ollama model inside LM Studio UI.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET community SDK providing strongly-typed Ollama client with IAsyncEnumerable streaming and DI helpers.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds an AI sidebar powered by any Ollama model—summarize notes, brainstorm, Q&A.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Bolt-js Slack bot that answers threads using Ollama models; supports code blocks, streaming, and model switching.
